original_text: But he refused to turn aside. Therefore Abner struck him in the stomach with the butt of his spear, so that the spear came out at his back. And he fell there and died where he was. And all who came to the place where Asahel had fallen and died, stood still.
korean_text: 그가 물러가기를 거절하매 아브넬이 창 뒤 끝으로 그의 배를 찌르니 창이 그의 등을 꿰뚫고 나간지라 곧 그 곳에 엎드러져 죽으매 아사헬이 엎드러져 죽은 곳에 이르는 자마다 머물러 섰더라

sentences.original_text: But he refused to turn aside.
Therefore Abner struck him in the stomach
with the butt of his spear,
so that the spear came out at his back.
And all who came to the place
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 장소에 온 모든 사람들은

sentences.original_text: where Asahel had fallen and died,
